sentences.en: A difference of color in the stars - oftener read of than seen in England - was really perceptible here.
sentences.cn: 经常能在英国书本上读到的,但却不易目睹的繁星异彩在这里一眼就能看到.
微小但可以察觉的变化

sentences.en: His lips curved in a barely perceptible smile.
sentences.cn: 他的嘴角弯了弯,露出一丝几乎察觉不到的笑容.

sentences.en: Just as in the dark - ground method phase objects are then perceptible.
sentences.cn: 正象在暗场法中一样,相物体这时就可以看见了.

sentences.en: Mark's success at university had a very perceptible change on his life.
sentences.cn: 马克在大学里的成功使他的生活发生了可察觉的变化.

sentences.en: Perceptible only as unaccountable influences that hinder progress.
sentences.cn: 只能理解为隐藏在进步后面的无法解释的影响力.

sentences.en: Simon turned away from them and went where the just perceptible path led him.
sentences.cn: 西蒙转身离开了他们,沿着勉强辨认得出的小路走去.

sentences.en: The brown of her complexion gave way on the cheek to a perceptible flush.
sentences.cn: 这当儿,她那棕色的脸颊上微微泛起一朵红云.

sentences.en: The difference is scarcely perceptible to the average reader.
sentences.cn: 这种差别一般读者几乎是察觉不到的.

sentences.en: The foreface tapers from eye to muzzle a perceptible stop.
sentences.cn: 前脸从眼睛向口吻方向呈锥形,止部清晰.

sentences.en: The only exception was Wu Sun - fu , who just parted his lips in a barely perceptible smile.
sentences.cn: 只有吴荪甫仅仅微露了一下牙齿,并没出声笑.

sentences.en: The split in today's world is perceptible even to a hasty glance.
sentences.cn: 即使是匆忙一瞥,当代世界的分裂也是显而易见.

sentences.en: There is no possibility that any perceptible change will happen within our own lifetime.
sentences.cn: 在我们这一辈子里,不可能发生什么看得见的变化.

sentences.en: There was a faint, barely perceptible movement of the water in the pool.
sentences.cn: 池里的水有一点微微的, 几乎看不出的流动.

sentences.en: There was a slight but perceptible air of neglect.
sentences.cn: 有一种微弱但可察觉的冷落意味。

sentences.en: These half - revelations made a perceptible difference in Fitzpiers.
sentences.cn: 这些半含 半 露的表现,使菲茨比尔斯身上产生了可以觉察到的变化.

words.tran_cn: 感知的，知觉的；有知觉力的
知觉的；感知的；有知觉的
显然地；可感觉得出地；看得出地
知觉地；有洞察力地；敏锐地
感觉力；理解力；可察觉性
知觉；[生理] 感觉；看法；洞察力；获取
感知；认为（perceive的过去分词）；领会

trans.tran_cn: 可感觉[感受]到的，可理解的，可认识的
trans.tran_en: something that is perceptible can be noticed, although it is very small
